title: Rebellion shakes Russian elite’s faith in Putin’s strength
description: The armed insurrection has shattered the carefully crafted myth that was the cornerstone of Putin’s presidency – that he represented stability and strength.

title: Why Russia’s Wagner Group has been in Ukraine, Africa and more
description: The Russian mercenary group at the center of this weekend's mutiny also operates globally from Ukraine to Africa.

title: Prigozhin’s rebellion raises questions about Wagner’s African footprint
description: A Kremlin crackdown on Wagner would have far-reaching consequences in Africa and the Middle East, where the mercenary group supplied firepower to despots.

title: Wagner rift adds to Russian weaknesses amid Ukraine’s counteroffensive
description: While troops from the Wagner mercenary group are not at the front line in Ukraine, losing them would hit Russian reserve numbers.

title: Many people have fled Venezuela. These migrants are returning.
description: Conditions in the authoritarian socialist country remain dire. But struggles abroad have led some émigrés to go back.

title: Belarusian dictator Lukashenko’s unlikely cameo as mediator with Wagner
description: Staving off open conflict between Russia and the Wagner Group will burnish Lukashenko's credentials but inviting Prigozhin to his country could be a challenge for the  longtime dictator.

title: Russian leaders try to reassert control after mercenary rebellion
description: The Russian president remained out of public sight as did Wagner mercenary boss Yevgeniy Prigozhin, while Russians wondered about what the failed rebellion would mean for the country.

title: Ukraine live briefing: Revolt calls into question Putin’s grip on power and Wagner Group’s future
description: The rebellion led by Yevgeniy Prigozhin illuminated “cracks in the facade” of Putin’s leadership, Secretary of State Antony Blinken said.

title: Sarah, Duchess of York, undergoes mastectomy after breast cancer diagnosis
description: The former Sarah Ferguson, 63, known as “Fergie” to royal watchers, urged others to get screened on her podcast, “Tea Talks With the Duchess and Sarah.”
